Module com.example.c195project
Package helper

Interface CustomerQuery

All Known Implementing Classes:
AddCustomerController
public interface CustomerQuery
interface for all query's to the database that involve the customers table.
Author:
Anthony Collins

    Field
    Description
    static final javafx.collections.ObservableList<Integer>
    listOfCustomerID
    observable list for holding customer IDs for various functions throughout the program.

    Static Methods
    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    static void
    deleteCustomer(int customerID)
    method to delete customers from the database, all appointments associated with the customer are deleted first and then the customer is deleted due to foreign key constraints.

    method for inserting a new customer into the database.

  • Field Details

    • listOfCustomerID

      static final javafx.collections.ObservableList<Integer> listOfCustomerID
      observable list for holding customer IDs for various functions throughout the program.

  • Method Details

    • deleteCustomer

      static void deleteCustomer(int customerID) throws SQLException
      method to delete customers from the database, all appointments associated with the customer are deleted first and then the customer is deleted due to foreign key constraints.
      Parameters:
      customerID - ID number of the customer to be deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectCustomerID

      static void selectCustomerID() throws SQLException
      all customer IDs are selected and fill the customer ID list to be used throughout the peogram.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • selectCustomerName

      static String selectCustomerName(int customerID) throws SQLException
      method to return a customer name when a customer ID is passed in.
      Parameters:
      customerID - the ID number for the customer whos name we want returned.
      Returns:
      customer name associated with the customer ID number.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • insert

      static void insert(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phone, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionID) throws SQLException
      method for inserting a new customer into the database.
      Parameters:
      customerName - name of the customer.
      address - address of the customer not including state/province/territory or country.
      postalCode - customers postal code.
      phone - customers phone number.
      createDate - the date the customer has been created.
      createdBy - who the customer has been created by.
      lastUpdate - when the customer was last updated.
      lastUpdatedBy - who the customer was last updated by.
      divisionID - division ID of the customer.
      Throws:
      SQLException

    • update

      static void update(String customerName, String address, String postalCode, String phone, LocalDateTime createDate, String createdBy, LocalDateTime lastUpdate, String lastUpdatedBy, int divisionID, int customerID) throws SQLException
      method for updating a existing customer within the database.
      Parameters:
      customerName - name of the customer.
      address - address of the customer not including state/province/territory or country.
      postalCode - customers postal code.
      phone - customer phone number.
      createDate - date the customer was created.
      createdBy - who the customer was created by.
      lastUpdate - when the customer was last updated.
      lastUpdatedBy - who the customer was last updated by.
      divisionID - division ID of the customer.
      customerID - Customer ID of the customer non-editable parameter.
      Throws:
      SQLException
